nodes.text: Worrita was a professor who was married to Mrs. Worrita and joined Lord Sargo VenHalgon on a vacation to the Cularin system around the time of the Clone Wars. They landed on Cularin, where Worrita, VenHalgon and Cannison went off hunting. However, they were chased up a cliff by a Kilassin. They were eventually rescued by the crew of the Starchaser IV.
